overview: Maddy O'Reilly is an ambitious grad student with her eye on a prestigious position at the university. Despite warnings from her mentor and collaborator Ryan (Brad Armstrong) and her fellow students, she becomes intertwined with a charming professor (Stirling Cooper) who may have ulterior and dangerous motives . With a cast rounded out by Kenna James, Victoria Voxxx and Karla Kush, higher education has never been never been hotter.
title: Student Affairs
